description: Transport Canada has a requirement for the supply, delivery, and installation of insulation onboard MV Madeleine II. The insulation must be delivered no later than December 15th, 2023, and installed no later than March 29th, 2024.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title (English/French):** T2012-230019 MV Madeleine II Insulation / T2012-230019 NM Madeleine II Madeleine isolation

**Reference Number**: WS4200134756 (Document 4204077210)

**Publication Date:** 2023-09-25

**Tender Closure Date:** 2023-11-02 14:00:00

**Amendment Number:** 4 (Amendment Date: 2023-10-25)

**Contract Duration**: None (Expected Contract Start/End: None/2024-03-31)

**Tender Status:** Cancelled

**UNSPSC Code:** 25111900
*Systèmes et sous-ensembles pour embarcations / Marine craft systems and subassemblies*

**Procurement Category:** Goods (Goods Designated for the Government of Canada / Categorie Désignée pour le gouvernement du Canada)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal / Demande de propositions

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding / Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

**Selection Criteria:** Variations of the above-mentioned methods / Variations ou combinaisons des méthodes susmentionnées

**Trade Agreements:** *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) | Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)*

**Region of Delivery:** Souris, Canada

**Contact Information:**
 Name: Christopher Young (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: christopher.young@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
**Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17541082?extsite=MTc1NDEwODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17541082?extsite=MTc1NDEwODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

This tender announcement concerns the supply, delivery, and installation of insulation for the vessel MV Madeleine II operated by Transport Canada. The delivery deadline for the insulation is set for no later than December 15th, 2023, and the installation deadline is set for no later than March 29th, 2024. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is overseeing this procurement, and potential suppliers should
